extendedInfo.description: Slate2Learn is a Note Taking app for School and College. Available in 16 languages and with the best wrist-protection in this category of apps, Slate2Learn is a feature-rich app that enhances your learning experience. Besides taking notes, you can record lectures and embed contextual audio, video and images. Bring alive a classroom lecture on your Android Phones and Tablets and share it among your peers!*WRITE, DRAW, TYPEMeet your note-taking needs with our collection of 2 Pens and 17 colors.Input text using your keyboard.*SHOOT, RECORD, EMBEDAdd photos to your Slate by shooting pictures instantly or from your Gallery.Add an Audio Recording or embed an Audio File stored on your Android Device.Add a Video recording, embed a video stored in your Gallery and fetch videos from the Web.*EMBED A WEB LINKEmbed a related Web link within a Slate.*ORGANIZESlates are organized into SlateBooks, akin to pages in a notebook.Change the theme of the SlateBook to suit your mood and style.*SHARESlates can be sent as a .jpeg to Mail, DropBox, Evernote, Facebook, Twitter  etc.Slates can be sent as a .pdf to Mail, DropBox ancd Evernote.*WRIST PROTECTIONThe most innovative and effective wrist protection available in note taking apps.*LOCK YOUR SLATEProtect your work within a Slate against unintended changes by locking it and making it read-only.*AVAILABLE IN 16 LANGUAGESEnglish, Arabic, Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), French, German, Hindi, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Tagalog, Thai, Turkish, VietnameseNote: For optimal performance, use a device with a minimum of  512MB RAM.

reviews.title: NOT BAD
reviews.comment: A very good note taking application ,easy to use and lots of features too.
reviews.author: SAJAN ANTONY

reviews.title: Cool application
reviews.comment: A nice application with lot of features and varity of themes for slates. Wrist protection is another feature that i like most.
reviews.author: jofin g

reviews.title: Nice application
reviews.comment: Awesome app. This one is better than most paid apps of this kind.  Suits well for students. I would like to use it on a tablet.
reviews.author: Deepak G Nair

reviews.title: Works well
reviews.comment: I was looking for an Android version of Explain Everything and this is great. My 6yr old is using it in class (all her peers are iOS) and doing great things with it. Pictograph\'s might help and look a little tidier (she is still learning to read) but it is still a great App.  Thank you.
reviews.author: Nicolas Heaton

reviews.title: Does not play or record multimedia
reviews.comment: Does not play or record multimedia even though options are provided
reviews.author: dec Twenty
